question: My 62 yo partner has controlled type 2 diabetes, but what we are trying to solve is the fact that she sweats buckets of moisture almost every night, enough that the sheets are saturated, and I know it is sweat because when I touch her when she is asleep, it is her skin sweating. She does not seem particularly warm or cool, just asleep. I have not had much luck figuring this out! Ideas?John
